name: Coffee Rain
description:
Who broke the cup?

you must find all the cup pieces and find out.  

This is a group project for Rmit. You explore a café called Coffee Rain finding all the cup pieces and find out who did it while Talking to a wide range of different characters. Talk to these characters to help you find the cup pieces and for some amusing dialogue. 

Game made by: Tristan Kopetzky, William Mitchell, Alex Reid and Maddy Salazar

**HOTFIX BUILD FIXES THE CURRENT CUP PIECE BUG** 

- Make sure you score is equal to 5 then interact with the bin in the corner to get the games ending!

- Cup pieces aren't gained on dialogue interaction so use the two bricks on the wall to add / remove score.
